text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i , j , k = 0 , m = 0 , d = 0 , f , b = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( j = m ; j < n ; j ++ ) { if ( j == n - 1 && a [ n - 1 ] - a [ n - 2 ] >= 0 ) { d = d + 1 ; break ; } else if ( j == n - 1 ) break ; else if ( a [ j + 1 ] - a [ j ] >= 0 ) k ++ ; else if ( a [ j + 1 ] - a [ j ] < 0 && k == b ) m = m + 1 ; else if ( a [ j + 1 ] - a [ j ] < 0 && k != b ) { f = k - b ; d = d + ( f * ( f + 1 ) ) / 2 ; m = m + j ; b = k ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , d + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
